ti:translation.ti:label: Iliad
ti:translation.ti:description: Homer. The Iliad, Volume 1-2. Murray, A. T. (Augustus Taber), translator. London: William Heinmann; New York: G.P. Putnam's Sons, 1924-1925.

ti:translation.ti:label: Iliad
ti:translation.ti:description: Homer. The Iliad of Homer, rendered into English prose for the use of those who cannot read the original. Butler, Samuel, 1835-1902, translator. London: Longmans, Green, and Co, 1898.

ti:edition.ti:label: Ἰλιάς
ti:edition.ti:description: Homer. Homeri Opera, Volumes 1-2. Monro, D. B. (David Binning), editor; Allen, Thomas W. (Thomas William), editor. Oxford: e typographeo Clarendoniano, 1908-1920.
